version_description:
Welcome to VideoMuse!! Record videos and keep your music playing – whatever music is already playing will be included in the video! Tag us with #VideoMuse & @VideoMuseApp

New in this version:
* Fixed an issue where videos might be lost if you close the app while a video is recording. Now, as soon as you return to the app, the video will be saved to your Photo library as expected.
* Fixed an issue where you might not be able to start a recording after this nonsense I just mentioned happened. No more nonsense.
* Some other tiny improvements!

Welcome to VideoMuse!! Record videos and keep your music playing – whatever music is already playing will be included in the video! Tag us with #VideoMuse & @VideoMuseApp

New in this version:
* Improved video saving reliability
* Bug fixes
* VideoMuse is now available in Simplified and Traditional Chinese!

New in this version:

* Added a scrubber to the saved video screen so you can see if you got the shot!
* Improvements for iOS 13. VideoMuse welcomes you to the future.
